thag2.46:1.1: The peacocks cry out with their fair crests and tails,
thag2.46:1.2: their lovely blue necks and fair faces, <j>their beautiful song and their call.
thag2.46:1.3: This broad earth is lush with grass and dew,
thag2.46:1.4: and the sky is full of beautiful clouds.
thag2.46:2.1: One practicing absorption is happy in mind, <j>and their appearance is uplifting;
thag2.46:2.2: going forth in the teaching of the Buddha <j>is easy for a good person.
thag2.46:2.3: You should realize that supreme, unchanging state,
thag2.46:2.4: so very pure, subtle, and hard to see.
